button.pay.description: Button text for paying the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing the payment of the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for viewing order details.

button.query.description: Button text for querying the order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually completing the order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating the order.

field.amount.description: The points amount of the order.

field.price.description: The points amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service used for transmitting data via HTTP.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to make a payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message indicating the order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan the code to complete the payment.
message.wechatPayHelp.description: Message providing help for WeChat payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment in the external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message indicating payment through an external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to paid status and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment, do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order is still waiting for user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order payment has failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating Alipay payment, which is an online payment.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website, indicating Stripe payment, which is an online payment.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website, indicating order management.

title.x402.description: Title for cryptocurrency payment based on the X402 scheme.

message.discountTag.description: Label text showing the applied discount percentage.

message.discountHint.message: A {percent}% OFF has been automatically applied for members.
message.discountHint.description: Hint for the member discount received.

message.x402DiscountApplied.message: Save an additional {percent}% by using X402 payment.
message.x402DiscountApplied.description: Explanation of the additional discount from choosing X402 payment.

message.x402DiscountHint.message: Enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF by choosing X402 payment.
message.x402DiscountHint.description: Hint encouraging users to choose X402 payment.

message.x402IntroShort.message: You can directly connect to a cryptocurrency wallet for payment, or switch to programming mode to obtain integration parameters.
message.x402IntroShort.description: Short introduction for the X402 payment dialog.

message.x402TabWallet.description: Title of the Wallet Payment Tab.

message.x402TabApi.description: Title of the API Access Tab.

message.x402WalletTitle.description: Title guiding users to connect their wallet.

message.x402WalletConnected.description: Indicator when the wallet is connected.

message.x402ConnectWallet.description: Text for the connect wallet button.

message.x402NoWalletDesc.message: No wallet detected. Please install MetaMask/Phantom or open this page in the wallet's built-in browser.
message.x402NoWalletDesc.description: Description when no EVM wallet is detected.

message.x402SwitchNetwork.message: Please switch your wallet network to {network}
message.x402SwitchNetwork.description: Prompt for the user to switch the wallet network.

message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.message: Solana X402 payment is not enabled for this order. Please switch network or refresh.
message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.description: Shown when the selected Solana network is not available in X402 payment requirements.

message.x402NeedConnectAccount.message: Please connect at least one compatible EVM wallet before proceeding to payment.
message.x402NeedConnectAccount.description: Reminder for the user to connect a wallet account first.

message.x402ConfirmTitle.description: Title of the confirmation dialog before signing an X402 payment.

message.x402ConfirmDesc.description: Description of the confirmation dialog before signing an X402 payment.

message.x402StepsTitle.description: Title for the list of payment steps.

message.x402Step1.message: Connect your wallet (install it first if not already installed, then refresh the page).
message.x402Step1.description: Step 1 of the wallet payment process.

message.x402Step2.message: Confirm that the wallet network is set to {network}.
message.x402Step2.description: Step 2 of the wallet payment process.

message.x402Step3.message: Click to pay and complete the authorization signature in your wallet.
message.x402Step3.description: Step 3 of the wallet payment process.

message.x402Step4.message: After signing, we will automatically settle and update the order status.
message.x402Step4.description: Step 4 of the wallet payment process.

message.x402IntegrationResourceLabel.description: Label for the payment API address.

message.x402IntegrationPayToLabel.description: Label for the blockchain receiving address.

message.x402IntegrationFallback.message: Failed to retrieve session parameters, please check the documentation or contact support for the necessary parameters.
message.x402IntegrationFallback.description: Fallback prompt when integration parameters are missing.

message.x402IntegrationDocsCta.description: Text for the button to open the X402 integration guide.

message.x402InstallGuideTitle.description: Title for the wallet installation guide dialog.

message.x402InstallGuideDesc.message: Follow the steps to install the {wallet} extension and reconnect.
message.x402InstallGuideDesc.description: Description for the wallet installation guide.

message.x402InstallGuideStep1.message: Download and install the {wallet} browser extension (recommended: Chrome/Brave).
message.x402InstallGuideStep1.description: Step 1 of the wallet installation process.

message.x402InstallGuideStep2.message: Open the extension, log in/unlock, and ensure it is enabled.
message.x402InstallGuideStep2.description: Step 2 of the wallet installation process.

message.x402InstallGuideStep3.message: Return to this page, click 'I have installed it', and then try to connect again.
message.x402InstallGuideStep3.description: Step 3 of the wallet installation process.

message.x402InstallGuideConfirm.description: Confirmation button after installation is complete.

message.x402NetworkGuideTitle.description: Title for the network guide dialog.

message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.message: Please switch your wallet network to {network}, then refresh and try again.
message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.description: Instructions for guiding the user to switch networks.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep1.message: Open the wallet extension settings and check the active network.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep1.description: Step 1 of the network adjustment process.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.message: Enable {network} (or the required network) from the list.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.description: Step 2 of the network adjustment process.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep3.message: Return to this page and click 'Settings Complete' before proceeding to payment.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep3.description: Step 3 of the network adjustment process.

message.x402NetworkGuideConfirm.description: Confirmation button after network settings are complete.

message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.message: The current wallet does not support automatic network switching, please switch manually and try again.
message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.description: Prompt when automatic network switching fails.

message.x402PaymentFailed.message: X402 wallet payment failed, please try again later or contact support.
message.x402PaymentFailed.description: General error message when X402 payment fails.

message.x402WalletPayCta.description: Text for the button to initiate X402 wallet payment.
